title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 386.4 - State reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 386.4 - State reimbursement

State Regulations

Each social services district shall be entitled to
100-percent State reimbursement for salaries paid to a fully qualified staff
development director, supervisor or coordinator who directs the training
program of the agency on a full-time basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
386.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
